com.atakmap.app.system

Class SystemComponentLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.app.system.SystemComponentLoader

  • public class SystemComponentLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Attenpt to load system level changes that can be made to ATAK by installing one or more APKs. These changes are more rigid and are not considered plugins since they cannot be loaded and unloaded during runtime. These are loaded during system start and remain loaded until the ATAK application is finished.
